title: A Flashback To A World On The Precipice Of War
teaser: On the eve of World War I, the United States was a vastly different place than it is today. NPR's Arun Rath talks with UC Davis history professor Eric Rauchway about life in the U.S. 100 years ago.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
